publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8069 Jamie McGrigor: Congratulations to the 2011 Scottish Restaurant Award Finalists—That the Parliament congratulates all the winners of the 2011 Scottish Restaurant Awards who were named on Monday 28 February 2011; considers that the Highlands and Islands restaurant sector was well represented, with the Isle of Eriska being named Best Hotel Restaurant of the Year, The Three Chimneys, Best Rural Restaurant of the Year and the Lochleven Seafood Café, Seafood Restaurant of the Year; recognises the importance of good food and drink in attracting further tourism to the Highlands and Islands and elsewhere in Scotland; encourages the use of local produce and considers that this has helped the winners of these awards achieve success, and wishes all those involved in these businesses continued success in the future.
